reviewText: I guess you could say some movies could have been dond better. this is one of them . great price

love this film . its funny well produced and  has  a very clever story line . This film has it all.
LOOKING FOR MUCH MORE FROM FILMAKER HE  HAS THAT TOUCH!!!!

I got a chance to screen this film at a festival, I didn't really want to as I'm not a big fan of rom-coms but my wife and her friends wanted to see it.  So we saw it, and as the film moved along I started to enjoy it - alot actually.

The filmmakers and the acting in it was very good, you believed everything everyone was doing which is important and it also had some very funny moments.

If you are looking for a fun, sexy, rom-com then I'd suggest you check this film out as you won't be disappointed.
